ds:selectable.expression: evaluate[if type.kindof[Change Request] then 'Change Request' else if type.kindof[Change Order] then 'Change Order' else if type.kindof[Decision] then 'Decision' else if type.kindof[Change Action] then 'Change Action' else '']

ds:field.name: dueDate
ds:field.description: The actual state date of object

ds:field.name: reason
ds:field.description: The comments associated with the resume action.

ds:field.description: The comments associated with the hold action.

ds:field.description: The comments associated with the cancel action.

ds:field.description: Date of last modification to any object information.

ds:field.description: The user who originally created the object.

ds:field.description: The actual state date of object

ds:field.description: The actual end date of object
